121_neutral.title: Quorum
121_neutral.summary: The quorum of Parliament shall be– (a) ﬁfty members, in the case of the National Assembly; or (b) 14 members in the Senate . Just summarize clearly with no stylistic twist .
121_neutral.rawTextPreview: The quorum of Parliament shall be– (a) ﬁfty members, in the case of the National Assembly; or (b) ﬁfteen members, in the case of the Senate.

lawyerReferral.name: Adv. Wanjiku N.
lawyerReferral.nextSteps: This issue may require human legal advice.
